definitions.definition: The state of being brothers or a brother (also figuratively).
An association of people for any purpose, such as a society of monks; a fraternity .
examples: James formed a kind of brotherhood for ex-pats who were working in Valencia.

definitions.definition: All the people engaged in the same business, especially those of the same profession
People, or (poetically) things, of the same kind.
